Name: Daxi Arredondo
Description:
Daxi was found dead by the SFPD at a hotel in the Tenderloin District of San Francisco. It is suspected that her death was the result of a pick-up crime.

Her murder was not recorded in the official Trans Day of Remembrance memorial lists collated by https://tdor.info. The source of the report was a fact sheet handed out by staff of CUAV (http://www.cuav.org) at the vigil for Ruby Ordenana in March 2007.

> Staff of CUAV passed out a frightening fact sheet -- three other violent deaths of transgendered women have been reported to the San Francisco agency over the last year.... On November 11, 2006, Daxi Arredondo was found dead by the SFPD at a hotel in the Tenderloin District of San Francisco. Ms. Arredondo was a 35 year old transsexual identified bi-racial Mexican-African American woman. It is suspected that Ms. Arredondo's death is the result of a pick-up crime....

https://happening-here.blogspot.com/2007/03/goodbye-dear-ruby.html

https://www.ebar.com/story.php?237643
Tweet:
Daxi Arredondo was found dead at a hotel in the Tenderloin District of San Francisco, California (USA) on 11 Nov 2006.

She was 35. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Name: Thalia Sandoval
Description:
Thalia was stabbed to death in her own home in Antioch. Prior to her death, she had met the alleged suspect at a bar.

Her murder was not recorded in the official Trans Day of Remembrance memorial lists collated by https://tdor.info. The source of the report was a fact sheet handed out by staff of CUAV (http://www.cuav.org) at the vigil for Ruby Ordenana in March 2007.

> Staff of CUAV passed out a frightening fact sheet -- three other violent deaths of transgendered women have been reported to the San Francisco agency over the last year.... On November 19, 2006, Thalia Sandoval, a 27 year old transgender Latina was stabbed to death in her home in Antioch, CA. ...Prior to her death, Ms. Sandoval had met the alleged suspect at a bar....

https://happening-here.blogspot.com/2007/03/goodbye-dear-ruby.html

Name: Valentina Falco
Description:
Valentina was stabbed and then her throat was slit while she was still alive. She bled to death.

Neighbors had called the police after becoming suspicious that the lights in Valentina’s terraced house in Dormelletto, Italy had been left on constantly. When they arrived to investigate they found her body in her bedroom.
